slides.paragraph: Treaty of Versailles, rise of fascism in Germany, Italy, Japan; global depression; appeasement of Hitler; failure of the League of Nations.

bullets: Allied Powers: Britain, France, Soviet Union (joined 1941), United States (joined 1941), China

slides.paragraph: 1939: Germany invades Poland; WWII begins. 1940: Fall of France; Battle of Britain. 1941: Operation Barbarossa (Germany invades USSR); Pearl Harbor attack brings US into war. 1942–43: Turning points with battles like Stalingrad (USSR), Midway (Pacific). 1944: D-Day (Allied invasion of Normandy, France). 1945: Germany surrenders (May); atomic bombs dropped on Hiroshima and Nagasaki; Japan surrenders (August).
United Nations founded (1945), Cold War begins between US & USSR, Europe divided; Germany occupied, Decolonization in Asia, Africa.
